wordpressPost.title: procrastinating again
wordpressPost.content:
I’m so bored, I really want to blog but can’t think of a topic, I had a fun weekend at home, got to see lots of people ðŸ™‚

I’m still thinking about church and love, and also evangalism and love after the pastor of Tab yelled at a drunk guy telling him he was going to hell, sorry but that is not the way to evangalise…for goodness sake find some sense, tell people they’re going to hell doesn’t work nor help. Why not chat to the guy, find out why he is completely plastered at 6pm on a sunday, help him through problems so that he sees the church as a positive thing, not some daft organisation that tells him he is going somewhere he probably doesn’t even believe in….grrr churches annoy me sometimes, where is the love?!
